t = taskMgr.doMethodLater(DG.DIRECT_FLASH_DURATION,
                                      # This is just a dummy task
                                      self.flashDummy,
                                      'flashNodePath',)
            t.nodePath = nodePath
            t.doneColor = doneColor
            # This really does all the work
            t.setUponDeath(self.flashDone)
